biotools.summary: Protein sequence alignment tool designed for protein remote homology detection. It accepts a multiple sequence alignment as input and converts it into the profile to search against a profile database for statistically significant similarities.

bioschemas.name: COMER
bioschemas.summary: Protein sequence alignment tool designed for protein remote homology detection. It accepts a multiple sequence alignment as input and converts it into the profile to search against a profile database for statistically significant similarities.
